All Classes

Class
Description
Board
Board class that is used for file processes.
Box
Class for boxes in the file.
BoxOnGoal
Class for boxes that are on a goal in the file.
Coord
Basic coordinate class.
GameLogic
GameLogic class, responsible for the most important logic implementations such as moves.
Goal
Class for goals in the file.
HiScores
High Scores class is responsible for storing game data.
HiScoresUI
HiScoresUI class extends JFrame, and is responsible for creating the gui for a HiScores Object.
InGame
InGame Class that extends JPanel.
LevelSelectorScreen
LevelSelectorScreen class that extends JFrame.
Main
Main Class, responsible for starting the game.
Menu
Menu class, responsible for the graphic implementation of the main Menu.
Path
Class for paths in the file.
Player
Class for player in the file.
PlayerOnGoal
Class for a player that is on a goal tile in the file.
Score
A record that contains the name and the steps made of a player in a game.
TileFactory
TileFactory class.
TileItem
Parent Class for the specific tiles, that are used in the game.
TileType
Enum, that enumerates the possible TileTypes.
Wall
Class for walls in the file.
